data.name: Pacific Gas & Electric Company PG&E
data.description: Pacific Gas & Electric Company PG&E provides natural gas and electricity to most of the northern two-thirds of California, including San Jose. They are committed to delivering safe and reliable energy services to their customers.
data.emergency_steps:
- Use a cell phone or hard-wired phone as cordless phones may not work without electricity.  
- Keep battery-operated flashlights on hand instead of candles to avoid fire hazards.  
- Unplug or turn off all electric and heat-producing appliances to prevent damage when power is restored.  
- Keep metal objects away from power lines to avoid outages or power surges.  
- Stay at least 10 feet away from all electrical solar equipment and connections during an emergency.

Non-Emergency Tips:  
- Check the San José Clean Energy website for updates on service status and community programs.  
- Consider opting for 100% renewable energy to contribute to the fight against climate change.
